Returns: String containing the host name or null if there is no proxy for this carrier.
getDefaultHost().Description: Use standard java vm proxy values to find the host, port and exclusion list. This call ignores the exclusion list and no longer reports only mobile-data apn-based proxy values. Return the default proxy host specified by the carrier.
getDefaultHost().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 15

Returns: The port number to be used with the proxy host or -1 if there is no proxy for this carrier.
getDefaultPort().Description: Use standard java vm proxy values to find the host, port and exclusion list. This call ignores the exclusion list and no longer reports only mobile-data apn-based proxy values. Return the default proxy port specified by the carrier.
getDefaultPort().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 15

Returns: String containing the host name. If the user did not set a host name it returns the default host. A null value means that no host is to be used.
Parameters: Context: A Context used to get the settings for the proxy host.
getHost(android.content.Context).Description: Use standard java vm proxy values to find the host, port and exclusion list. This call ignores the exclusion list. Return the proxy host set by the user.
getHost(android.content.Context).history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 15

Returns: The port number to use or -1 if no proxy is to be used.
Parameters: Context: A Context used to get the settings for the proxy port.
getPort(android.content.Context).Description: Use standard java vm proxy values to find the host, port and exclusion list. This call ignores the exclusion list. Return the proxy port set by the user.
getPort(android.content.Context).history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 15

ClassDesc: A convenience class for accessing the user and default proxy settings.
